content:
<rule id="mvc-02300" xmlns="http://windup.jboss.org/schema/jboss-ruleset">
            <when>
                <or>
                    <file filename="adf-settings.xml"/>
                    <file filename="adfc-config.xml"/>
                </or>
            </when>
            <perform>
                <classification category-id="information" effort="0" title="Embedded library - Oracle ADF">
                    <description>The application embeds an Oracle ADF library.</description>
                </classification>
                <technology-tag level="INFORMATIONAL">Oracle ADF</technology-tag>
            </perform>
        </rule>
